Movies.title: Inception
Movies.description: A mind-bending thriller about dream invasion and shared consciousness.

Movies.title: The Godfather
Movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

Movies.title: Parasite
Movies.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household.

Movies.title: Interstellar
Movies.description: Earth’s future threatened, a team travels through a wormhole to find a new home.

Movies.title: The Dark Knight
Movies.description: Batman faces off against the Joker in Gotham City.

Movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
Movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

Movies.title: Forrest Gump
Movies.description: Life story of Forrest, a simple man with a kind heart who witnesses historic events.

Movies.title: The Matrix
Movies.description: A hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Movies.title: Gladiator
Movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

Movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Movies.description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.
